price: 61. Maudits ils sont, et ils seront saisis où qu’ils se trouvent pour être tués sans aucune pitié.
arabic: مَّلۡعُونِينَۖ أَيۡنَمَا ثُقِفُوٓاْ أُخِذُواْ وَقُتِّلُواْ تَقۡتِيلٗا

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: malʿūnīna aynamā thuqifū ukhidhū waquttilū taqtīlan
